response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item boasts unique features and benefits that set it apart from the rest, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to elevate their experience. Given its quality and craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than $150. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for $199. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing you with the best possible product. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly special. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 199}
